message.body: Erik's dad will be in town in a couple of hours and then we will get some lunch. We don't really have a time set - sorry but I imagine we will be free by
4. Is your plan to be in the city all day?
No, we're going to be in Wilmington first and then planning to stop in center city on the way back. We can hang out for a while until you guys are free and then just visit for a little bit?
We want to get back to Maple Glen relatively early tonight because the race is so early tomorrow.
That sounds good. Let me know when you get to Phila
Would you guys be able to meet us north of the city when you're free? We're having some logistical issues...if not, maybe it's just not meant to be this time.
We're still with Erik's dad. Where north would you want to meet? I will talk with Erik and let you know. If a visit doesn't work out this time we plan t
o go to obx this summer so hopefully we can figure out a visit then.
Maybe Glenside or Willow Grove? No pressure. OBX would be awesome.
Just got back from seeing Erik's dad which was longer than expected. I think it's best if we catch up another time - sorry visits haven't worked out for
us recently. Please wish Ritchie luck for us tomorrow! Talk soon xx
Totally okay! Keep us posted about NC this summer. xoxo!
